summary: INTERMITTENTLY PARK BRAKE ENGAGED WITHOUT WARNING. ALSO WHEN PARK BRAKE WAS ENGAGED IT WAS DIFFICULT TO DISENGAGE,  AFTER THESE DIFFICULTIES THE BRAKE FAILED COMPLETELY AND WAS REPLACED.  PROBLEMS RE-OCCURRED AFTER REPLACEMENT.  VEHICLE IS A 1996 ALLEGRO P30(MOTOR HOME) WITH A 1996 CHEVROLET CHASSIS. *JB
